title: Rover CEO's Global Insights on the Pet Care Industry
description: Brent Turner, CEO of Rover, discusses global trends in the pet care industry with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” He says Rover aims to become pet owners’ essential app. (Source: Bloomberg)
